item.title: GLOBAL FANDEMIC (Split Set)
item.description: The Machine Girl A2B2 Night Of Fire Set, split by me (in opus). Global Fandemic Download DetailsSplitted by using ffmpeg and python (thanks some dude from stackexchange). Cover art made by using youtube-dl, ffmpeg, remove.bg and gimp. Downloaded 2 frames (the one with the global fandemic text and one before that) by doing this.Removed most of the background from the frame with the text by using remove.bg.Removed the rest of the background in gimp.
